overview:
Samuel Mueller ist the CEO and co-founder of Scandit, a leading technology and platform to power, analyze and monetize mobile product interaction, which offers best-in-class barcode scanning for mobile applications. Endorsed by the global barcode standardization organization as its preferred technology, in use by hundreds of parties in more than 25 countries and powering the popular Scandit Shopping app, the company’s mission is to turn frictionless product interaction into a standard mobile phone capability.

Before becoming an entrepreneur, Samuel was a consultant and project leader for multinational companies such as Swiss Re, Swiss Airlines and IBM and a corporate researcher at the renowned IBM Zurich Research Lab. Samuel holds a PhD from ETH Zurich and graduated summa cum laude with an MSc in Computer Science and an MA in Financial Economics from the University of Zurich, Switzerland.
